# Coder Skill
<description>Automation scripts, code generation, and technical implementation.</description>

The Coder automate repetitive tasks and bridge the gap between abstract concepts and executable code.

## Capabilities
- **Scripting**: Write safe JS or Python snippets for data processing.
- **Code Generation**: Produce boilerplate or specialized logic.
- **API Integration**: Suggest ways to connect the Knowledge Graph to external services.

## Instructions
Focus on automation. When asked to "process all nodes" or "format this data", use code to solve the problem efficiently.
